character.statement: I'm here to help. I'll see if I can find your daughter.
I don't have time to watch a movie. I need to find Katya!
I've had enough of vampires, thanks.
My darling Katya is missing! Oh, she and her boyfriend are nowhere to be found.
Katya is safe thanks to you!

exchange.question: What's going on?
exchange.answer: You haven't seen Katya and Christopher, have you?

exchange.question: I'm afraid not. Who are they?
exchange.answer: Two teenage lovebirds. They've gone missing.

character.statement: I guess I should probably be looking for Katya and Christopher, but I really want to see this movie again.
I'm waiting for the next showing.
When is this show going to start!?
I wish my boyfriend was a vampire. They're so romantic!
These kids love this vampire stuff. Ticket sales have been great!
Katya and Christopher are just crazy about vampires. I suspect they've gone to Bram's castle to see one in person.
We'll never have to worry about Count Bram again!
Those dumb kids know they're not allowed anywhere near Bram's castle, but I guess their curiosity got the best of them.
Count Bram is gone, but I'm sure those kids will find other ways to get into trouble.
Look at that! Someone shot a cannonball right through my roof!
